Kyle is a six foot two 17 year old bully and he has no friends. Why would he want friends? Other people are scum in his eyes and he's quite content with making their lives living hell. Then one day he shrinks down. What will happen to him?

He has four sisters:

Kelly - 8 years old
Chloe - 13 years old

There are only a few rules that I need everyone to follow. First of all, he shrinks to either two inches, or baby sized. You can make him grow from two inches but don't grow him past baby size.
